title: Tom Brady...The Analyst, Richest Athletes in Sports
itunes:title: Tom Brady...The Analyst, Richest Athletes in Sports
description:
Join Scarlet Fu and Mike Lynch on Business of Sports as they discuss Tom Brady's record deal with Fox Sports and the richest athletes in sports. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
